content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ryanah. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I would like to discuss the rental price to ensure that it meets your needs and my expectations. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental in New York City?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of x Euros per month. Can you please let me know what the rental price is?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Ryanah. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am confident that we can reach an agreement on a rental price that works for both of us. May I ask what your budget is for a monthly rental in New York City?
name: Heinrich Heine
